description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.bDIo9DCOE12RWFsW]{Ace Pilot}

Speeding in a vehicle gives you a heady rush, and you can easily handle operating vehicles at high velocities that might send lesser pilots spinning out of control. Reduce any penalties to Piloting checks you make when on a vehicle by 1. When you take the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.iITLDCRDHyAiR3Ua.JournalEntryPage.R1Gtge4nV39IFeZQ#double-maneuver-(full)]{double maneuver} action during a vehicle chase (see page 283), reduce the penalty for each action by 1. Whenever a Piloting check has a penalty for failing by 5 or more, you take that penalty only if you fail by 10 or more.
